pages.text: $(li) You can now pet dogs by sneak clicking them with an empty hand :) $(li) You can edit signs by right clicking $(li) You can right click to harvest crops $(li)Villagers will follow you if you have an emerald block in your hand.$(li) Campfires make the eltra go higher

$(li) Beacons will heal tamed and netural mobs $(li) Cauldrons can be used as an infinite water source by sneaking when placing water. $(li) You can color nether portals by placing colored glass underneath $(li) You can use pig iron to give tools a small boost in durability at an anvil
